title: Javadoc Warnings in the Gradle plugin

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Description

While building Quarkus (using `./mvnw -B clean install -DskipTests -DskipITs -DskipDocs -Prelocations`), I get the following warnings while building the Gradle plugin: 

```bash
[INFO] --- exec-maven-plugin:3.0.0:exec (gradle) @ io.quarkus.gradle.plugin ---
To honour the JVM settings for this build a single-use Daemon process will be forked. See https://docs.gradle.org/7.5.1/userguide/gradle_daemon.html#sec:disabling_the_daemon.
Daemon will be stopped at the end of the build 
> Task :gradle-application-plugin:clean UP-TO-DATE
> Task :gradle-model:compileJava UP-TO-DATE
> Task :gradle-application-plugin:compileJava
> Task :gradle-application-plugin:pluginDescriptors
> Task :gradle-application-plugin:processResources
> Task :gradle-application-plugin:classes
> Task :gradle-application-plugin:jar
/home/runner/work/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/extension/QuarkusPluginExtension.java:141: warning: no @param for fileCollection
    public static File getLastFile(FileCollection fileCollection) {
> Task :gradle-application-plugin:javadoc
                       ^
/home/runner/work/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/extension/QuarkusPluginExtension.java:141: warning: no @return
    public static File getLastFile(FileCollection fileCollection) {
                       ^
/home/runner/work/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/tasks/QuarkusDev.java:131: warning: no @return
    public Configuration getQuarkusDevConfiguration() {
                         ^
/home/runner/work/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/tasks/QuarkusDev.java:141: warning: no @return
    public FileCollection getSources() {
                          ^
/home/runner/work/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/tasks/QuarkusDev.java:151: warning: no @return
    public FileCollection getCompilationOutput() {
                          ^
/home/runner/work/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/tasks/QuarkusDev.java:162: warning: no @return
    public Property<File> getWorkingDirectory() {
                          ^
/home/runner/work/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/tasks/QuarkusDev.java:170: warning: no @param for workingDir
    public void setWorkingDir(String workingDir) {
                ^
/home/runner/work/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/tasks/QuarkusDev.java:185: warning: no @return
    public boolean isPreventnoverify() {
                   ^
/home/runner/work/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus-prettytime/quarkus/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/tasks/QuarkusDev.java:197: warning: no @param for preventNoVerify
    public void setPreventnoverify(boolean preventNoVerify) {
                ^
9 warnings
```

### Implementation ideas

Fix the Javadoc warnings
